Coboy Junior Farewell Concert 2014

Coboy Junior Farewell Concert 2014 is one of the biggest music concert held by Berlian Entertainment on March 2014 in Tennis Indoor Senayan Jakarta. The event was attended about 4.000 visitor with most of them are teenager/kids.

Easy Set Up

When you have such a good events but only limited time to prepare. Let’s face it, when technology doesn’t work, money is lost. Working closely with the ticket technologists at Loket.com, Berlian Entertainment can start to sell their ticket only within a day preparation.

Offline Pre-Sales

In order to giving more buzz marketing effect of this event, Loket.com provides Berlian Entertainment with a powerful tool to sell their event's ticket offline where thousand people in the line and the tickets was sold out within one hour.

Boosting Ticket Sales

Berlian Entertainment had never really explored the opportunity offered by social media to not only promote but sell tickets. Via Loket.com, Berlian Entertainment had freedom to use Loket.com digital promotion media. This has had a major impact on ticket sales even only for short ticket sales period.

Secure Managing Entries

With the Loket.com system, Berlian Entertainment now can do quicker ticket security checking, stylish ticket scanner, visitor check-in controller and door entry till giving them absolute security control since this event visitor mostly is teenager/kids.
